privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.legalContext: We operate as a compliant e-commerce technology provider and process user data solely for order fulfillment, payment processing, and regulatory compliance.
privacy.intro: MENARUSH Commerce ("MENARUSH", "we", "our", or "us") is a technology-enabled e-commerce company. We are committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of our customers and website visitors. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect information when you visit our website, make purchases, or interact with our services.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: We may collect the following types of information:
items: Information voluntarily submitted through contact forms or inquiries

sections.title: 2. How We Use Information
sections.content: We use collected information for the following purposes:
items: Communicating with customers about orders and services
Improving our website and service quality
Ensuring compliance with legal and regulatory obligations

sections.title: 3. Payment Information
content: Payments are processed via third-party payment service providers.
MENARUSH Commerce does not store or process payment card information directly.
Payment transactions are handled exclusively by licensed payment providers and financial institutions.
We do not have direct access to your payment card details.

sections.title: 4. Data Sharing & Disclosure
sections.content: We do not sell, rent, or trade personal data. Information may be shared only when necessary:
items: With trusted service providers for order fulfillment and delivery
With payment processors for transaction processing
To comply with legal obligations or regulatory requests
To protect our legal rights or prevent misuse of our services

sections.title: 5. Data Security
sections.content: We implement reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect information against unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. While no system can guarantee absolute security, we strive to maintain industry-appropriate safeguards.

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
sections.content: We retain personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill business purposes, process orders, or comply with legal requirements. When information is no longer required, it is securely deleted or anonymized.

sections.title: 7. Your Rights
sections.content: Depending on applicable laws, you may have the right to:
items: Request access to your personal data
Request correction or deletion of inaccurate information
Object to certain data processing activities
Request a copy of your data

sections.title: 8. Cookies & Analytics
sections.content: Our website may use cookies or analytics tools for website functionality, performance monitoring, and to improve user experience.

sections.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the website operated by MENARUSH Commerce ("MENARUSH", "we", "our", or "us").
terms.intro2: By accessing or using this website, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
content: MENARUSH Commerce is a technology-enabled e-commerce company offering consumer goods and digital services.
Our website is intended to provide information about our products and services, and to facilitate online purchases.
These Terms apply to all purchases and use of our website and services.

sections.title: 2. Products and Services
content: We offer consumer goods and digital commerce services through our online storefront.
Product descriptions, images, and prices are subject to change without notice.
We reserve the right to limit quantities, refuse orders, or discontinue products at any time.
All products are subject to availability.

sections.title: 3. Orders and Payment
content: By placing an order, you agree to provide accurate and complete information.
Payments are processed via third-party payment service providers.
MENARUSH Commerce does not store or process payment card information directly.
We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order at our discretion.
items: Order confirmation does not guarantee product availability.
Prices are subject to change without notice.
Payment must be received before order processing and shipment.

sections.title: 4. Shipping and Delivery
content: Shipping terms and delivery times will be communicated upon order confirmation.
We are not responsible for delays caused by shipping carriers or customs.
Risk of loss and title pass to you upon delivery to the carrier.

sections.title: 5. Returns and Refunds
content: Return and refund policies will be specified for each product category.
Customers must contact us within the specified timeframe to initiate returns.
Refunds will be processed according to our refund policy and may take several business days.

sections.title: 6. Digital Services
content: Digital services are provided as described at the time of purchase.
Delivery methods for digital services will be specified for each service.
Refund policies for digital services may differ from physical products.

sections.title: 7. Use of Website
sections.content: You agree to use this website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms.

items: Use the website for unlawful, misleading, or fraudulent activities
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to systems or data
Interfere with the operation or security of the website
Copy or reproduce any content without permission

sections.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law:
items: MENARUSH shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid for the specific product or service.
We make no warranties regarding product availability or delivery times beyond our control.

sections.title: 9. Intellectual Property
content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and design elements, is the property of MENARUSH Commerce or its licensors.
You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without prior written consent.

sections.title: 10. Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt, without regard to conflict of law principles.

sections.title: 11. Changes to These Terms
content: We may update these Terms from time to time.
Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions regarding these Terms, please contact:
